name: RustScan - fast port discovery (with Nmap handoff)
description: RustScan is a high-speed port scanner that can hand off discovered open ports to Nmap for service/version detection and scripting. The example runs RustScan with elevated privileges and then calls Nmap features on discovered ports.

commands.name: Fast scan and run Nmap scripts, save output
commands.description: Run RustScan against $IP, handing discovered ports to Nmap with aggressive detection (-A) and default scripts (-sC). Output saved to a templated file `rustscan-{TARGET}.txt`.

commands.name: Save RustScan raw output
commands.description: Capture RustScan raw output to a file for later parsing (example raw output command).
